## Checklist

- [ ] Lint: `npm run lint`
- [ ] Typecheck: `npm run typecheck`
- [ ] A11y smoke: `npm run test:a11y` (if `/design/*` affected)
- [ ] Visual regression: `npm run test:visual` (if styles/layout affected)
- [ ] If visuals changed intentionally, baselines updated: `npm run test:visual:update`
- [ ] Docs updated (if public API/usage changed)
